captions.text:
so I just lifted the entire island out
at the ocean and I was about to throw it into outer---
wait, is that your new stage voice?
Well I mean, are you like gargling marbles or something? I could barely understand you..
I'm gonna make this pencil disappear..

That wasn't a magic trick, I saw
the pencil just went up into his eye
I don't know how though. We completely smashed this car.
So you gonna go back up there and catch the Joker?
Come on... Watch it, watch it. Come on, hit me, hit me!! Hit me!!
You ran over a human being?
You wanna know how I got these scars?
Hey, he said he wanted me to do it...
I'll bet Gotham loves you now.

Well, it turns out the Joker already had this
unbeatable plan
a lot of people died and (clears throat)
How is this a good story?

It's because I'm the hero Gotham deserves
but not the one it needs..
It's complicated but it's pretty awesome when you think about it.
Yeah I don't know what any of that means.
you know what I would've done
Probably just fly really fast, saving everyone from the bullets and explosions, exactly!!
Yea, well can't do all those things.
Because I'm not a super bulletproof alien from another planet that can defy gravity
but you know I can do?

So are just gonna pretend like those guys
never happened?
How are you even speaking so clearly?
It makes no sense, I should be like I only have a half a face.....

title: How The Dark Knight Should Have Ended

those guys never happened?" and there's a bunch of old Batman villians 
sitting at the table behind them, Two-Face is sitting there. But Two-Face 
*was* in The Dark Knight, because Harvey Dent was Two-Face.
